name: Warrior’s Treasure-Dream Adventure
description:
Warrior’s Treasure is a fun-filled children's adventure game.
Hey!Friends your favorite brave warrior is back and he is on a adventure journey and need your help twist and turn the platforms to guide the warrior pick the diamond,but be aware there are many obstacles and other traps avoid all of them to pick the diamond.Now,start your challenge,good luck!

Game Features:
- Traps,diamond,obstacles and so on,more surprises are waiting for you to find
- Well-designed frames,vivid scenes
- Full of excited game levels make you never want to stop
- Simple and funny operations make you easy to play Warrior’s Treasure
